mapper.select: select concat("DOC",gd.DOCUMENT_KEY) as id, gd.DOCUMENT_TITLE as text, concat("DIR",gdr.DIR_KEY) as parent, gd.DOCUMENT_STATE as state from GUIDE_DOCUMENT as gd inner join GUIDE_DIR as gdr on gd.DIRECTORY_KEY = gdr.DIR_KEY union select concat("DIR", gdr.DIR_KEY), gdr.DIR_NAME, if(gdr.DIR_KEY = gdr.DIR_PARENT_KEY , "#", concat("DIR",gdr.DIR_PARENT_KEY)),gdr.DIR_STATE from GUIDE_DIR as gdr
select DOCUMENT_TEXT from GUIDE_DOCUMENT where DOCUMENT_KEY=#{id}
mapper.update: update GUIDE_DOCUMENT SET DOCUMENT_TEXT=#{content} where DOCUMENT_KEY=#{id}
update GUIDE_DOCUMENT SET DOCUMENT_TITLE=#{text}, DIRECTORY_KEY=#{parent}, DOCUMENT_STATE=#{state} where DOCUMENT_KEY=#{key}
